definitions.definition: (usually followed by the particle "to") To hope; to wish (something, or something to be accomplished); be intent upon
definitions.example: He intends to go to university.

definitions.definition: To fix the mind on; attend to; take care of; superintend; regard.
To bend or turn; direct, as one’s course or journey.
To design mechanically or artistically; fashion; mold.

definitions.example: 2002, United States General Accounting Office, Report to congressional committees: Foreign assistance read at http//www.gao.gov/new.items/d02787.pdf on 14 May 2006 - Funds were spent for intended purposes and not misused.

definitions.definition: Made tense; stretched out; extended; forcible; violent.
